page.title: 07GREAT BERWICK FARM CONT'D.
page.content: {GREAT BERWICK FARM}(CONT.FROM page 6) The farmer said that it was convenient living close to Shrewsbury,yet away from the noise of a town. The farm is also slightly historic, as the farmer said it was possible that troops had camped in the area of the farm at the time of the Battle of Shrewsbury.(1403).He also said that the old Shrewsbury road used to cut through the farm . { {LEATON KNOLLS}_ RECREATION There are quite a few recreational hobbies in this area,among them shooting,hunting,and fishing.The River Severn hosts the Tynsley & Sabrina fishing clubs.Gardening is popular in this area as several large gardens were noted on the main road.
